mapper.sql: id, tn_id as tnId, config_key as configKey, config_order as configOrder, check_rule as checkRule, domain, create_date as createDate, modify_date as modifyDate, data_type as dataType, data_url as dataUrl, data_value as dataValue, is_retain as isRetain,
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO saas_tenant_config_instance ( tn_id, config_key, config_order, check_rule, domain, create_date, modify_date, data_type, data_url, data_value, is_retain ) VALUES ( #{tnId}, #{configKey}, #{configOrder}, #{checkRule}, #{domain}, #{createDate}, #{modifyDate}, #{dataType}, #{dataUrl}, #{dataValue}, #{isRetain} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE saas_tenant_config_instance
tn_id = #{tnId},
config_key = #{configKey},
config_order = #{configOrder},
check_rule = #{checkRule},
domain = #{domain},
create_date = #{createDate},
modify_date = #{modifyDate},
data_type = #{dataType},
data_url = #{dataUrl},
data_value = #{dataValue},
is_retain=#{isRetain}
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE saas_tenant_config_instance
tn_id = #{map.tnId},
config_key = #{map.configKey},
config_order = #{map.configOrder},
check_rule = #{map.checkRule},
domain = #{map.domain},
create_date = #{map.createDate},
modify_date = #{map.modifyDate},
data_type = #{map.dataType},
data_url = #{map.dataUrl},
data_value = #{map.dataValue},
is_retain=#{map.isRetain},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO saas_tenant_config_instance ( tn_id, config_key, config_order, check_rule, domain, create_date, modify_date, data_type, data_url, data_value, is_retain ) VALUES ( #{map.tnId}, #{map.configKey}, #{map.configOrder}, #{map.checkRule}, #{map.domain}, #{map.createDate}, #{map.modifyDate}, #{map.dataType}, #{map.dataUrl}, #{map.dataValue}, #{map.isRetain} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM saas_tenant_config_instance
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{id} , '%')
AND tn_id like CONCAT('%', #{tnId} , '%')
AND config_key like CONCAT('%', #{configKey} , '%')
AND config_order like CONCAT('%', #{configOrder} , '%')
AND check_rule like CONCAT('%', #{checkRule} , '%')
AND domain like CONCAT('%', #{domain} , '%')
AND create_date like CONCAT('%', #{createDate} , '%')
AND modify_date like CONCAT('%', #{modifyDate} , '%')
AND data_type like CONCAT('%', #{dataType} , '%')
AND data_url like CONCAT('%', #{dataUrl} , '%')
AND data_value like CONCAT('%', #{dataValue} , '%')
AND is_retain like CONCAT('%',isRetain,'%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
